QuestData.Title: They Will Be Mist
QuestData.Description: The mist in this forest is a constant nuisance - one which I'm glad to hand off to trainees like you. Strange creatures lurk in the mist between these trees, and they must constantly be pushed back.$b$bConsider this part of your training.
QuestData.CompletionText: Living outside of society has its advantages. I can focus all my energies on training, without being shackled to the societal conventions of modesty, politics, and basic personal hygiene. Here in the woods, I am free to be myself.
